admin_can_change_password_without_knowin: An administrator can change a user's password without knowing the current password.
after_changing_user_must_login_with_new_: After the change, the user must log in with the new password.
name_must_be_at_least_2_characters: The name must contain at least 2 characters
password_must_be_at_least_6_characters: Password must contain at least 6 characters
username_must_be_at_least_3_characters: Login must contain at least 3 characters
